trans-unit.source: This book is a reference for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> users, typically application developers. <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> users who are not familiar with the SQL standard or the Java programming language will benefit from consulting books on those topics.
